HIPAARiskDTO Data Type

Information that is required for incidents related to HIPAA.

Properties
name data type description
hipaa_adverse boolean Given the nature and extent of the PHI involved, is it likely that the information could be used by an unauthorized recipient in a manner adverse to the individual or otherwise used to further the unauthorized recipient's own interests?

Specify null to indicate that you do not know.
hipaa_misused boolean Is it likely that the unauthorized recipient has misused or will misuse the information?

Specify null to indicate that you do not know.
hipaa_acquired boolean Was the information actually acquired or viewed?

Specify null to indicate that you do not know.
hipaa_additional_misuse boolean Is it likely that additional or further misuse of the data will occur?

Specify null to indicate that you do not know.
hipaa_breach boolean Based on your overall assessment of the incident, is it likely that a breach has occurred? Note: A true value will result in notification tasks being generated. You may also provide true if your organization chooses to forego the assessment and notify regarding all incidents.

Specify null to indicate that you do not know.
hipaa_adverse_comment string Any additional notes relating to the hipaa_adverse property.
hipaa_misused_comment string Any additional notes relating to the hipaa_misused property.
hipaa_acquired_comment string Any additional notes relating to the hipaa_acquired property.
hipaa_additional_misuse_comment string Any additional notes relating to the hipaa_additional_misuse property.
hipaa_breach_comment string Any additional notes relating to the hipaa_breach property.

Example

{
  "hipaa_adverse" : true,
  "hipaa_misused" : true,
  "hipaa_acquired" : true,
  "hipaa_additional_misuse" : true,
  "hipaa_breach" : true,
  "hipaa_adverse_comment" : "...",
  "hipaa_misused_comment" : "...",
  "hipaa_acquired_comment" : "...",
  "hipaa_additional_misuse_comment" : "...",
  "hipaa_breach_comment" : "..."
}
